product_highlights: Global leader in testing, inspection, and certification
Integration of product testing with regulatory audits
Quality system certification and compliance verification
Extensive global network and industry expertise
notes: SGS is a global leader in testing, inspection, and certification with extensive cosmetics industry experience. They provide comprehensive auditing services including regulatory compliance audits, quality system certification, and supplier assessments. SGS can integrate auditing with their product testing services for complete quality assurance solutions.
